review.title: “Great place to work.”
review.pros: Pros – Access to management and change to thrive were both easy and rewarding. Would still be there today if the real estate market had not changed.
review.cons: Cons – Sometimes the leadership would not take criticism well or utilize the advice of the staff. This held the company back in some regards.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep your eye on the big picture and keep moving ahead. Branch out of the safe zone and tackle new terrritories.
